channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Supreme Court Agrees to Hear Major Campaign Finance Challenge
item.description: The case involves a challenge to federal limits on how much political parties can spend in coordination with candidates.

item.title: Idaho Sniper Shooting Leaves 2 Firefighters Dead
item.description: Firefighters were responding to a blaze in the panhandle of Idaho when the shooting happened, a sheriff said. The body of a suspect was recovered on S...

item.title: Trump Administration Finds Harvard Violated Civil Rights Law
item.description: The university had recently restarted talks with the White House regarding a potential deal after months of fighting in court.

item.title: Violence Erupts Between Israeli Settlers and Military in West Bank
item.description: Hard-right activists clashed with troops and set fire to a security site following a growing wave of attacks on Palestinians in the occupied territory...

item.title: 87% of business leaders think AI agents will replace human employees if companies don’t make big moves to upskill their workforce
item.description: “As employers, we have a responsibility to help prepare current and future workers for the transition to a new era of work.”

item.title: GoFundMe launches new funds aimed at maximizing charitable donations
item.description: GoFundMe is launching Giving Funds, a type of donor-advised fund.

item.title: Democrats Lay Groundwork for a ‘Project 2029’
item.description: The plan to write a policy agenda for the next Democratic president is at the center of a raging debate within the party: whether its biggest problem ...

item.title: Robinhood plans to launch its own blockchain, offers ‘Stock Tokens’ in EU
item.description: The online brokerage continues to expand its crypto footprint after laying out nearly $400 million for two recent crypto acquisitions.

item.title: How this CEO built a 35-year reign at Aflac without burning out
item.description: Aflac’s Dan Amos has outlasted market cycles, activist investors, and generational change

item.title: Serena Williams says talent alone only gets you so far: For career success, like tennis, you have to grind ‘every day’
item.description: The 43-year-old tennis icon says humility and perseverance are key to success, echoing other leaders like Brian Niccol, Steve Jobs, and Mark Cuban.

item.title: Map: Tracking Tropical Storm Flossie
item.description: See the likely path and wind arrival times for Flossie.

item.title: Europe Heat Wave Drives Record-High Temperatures, Prompting Health Alerts
item.description: Extreme heat has gripped countries including France, Greece, Italy, Portugal and Spain, with record temperatures, health alerts and wildfires.

item.title: Nonprofits Lose Legal Bid to Halt U.K. Exports of Fighter Jet Parts to Israel
item.description: A top court ruled Monday that the British government, rather than judges, should decide on the “acutely sensitive and political issue.”
